app_descript:
Brief: "Planos de fundo" is an app that redefines the aesthetics of your device, bringing freshness to your screen every single day. It offers you the pleasure of choosing from your favorite categories to receive a brand new wallpaper image daily, ensuring your device's backdrop remains vibrant and personalized.

The "Planos de fundo" app is all about bringing a touch of novelty and personalization to your device every day. Despite its need for particular permissions, it maintains an edge with its user-friendly features and customization options. While it's perfect for those who love a frequent change of scene on their device, it does call for cautious consideration of data and storage permissions. The app is accessible for all Android users looking to spice up their phone or tablet's visual appeal.
